scenario: Intuitive Surgical, Inc. ISRG announced plans to acquire the da Vinci and Ion distribution businesses in Italy, Spain, Portugal, Malta, San Marino, and associated territories. The acquisition, subject to regulatory approvals, is expected to close in 2026 and expand Intuitive's direct presence in these regions. Intuitive has entered into agreements with current distributors ab medica, Abex, and Excelencia Robotica to purchase their Intuitive product-related business. The acquired businesses will be fully integrated into Intuitive's European operations, led by Senior Vice President and General Manager Dirk Barten. CEO Gary Guthart expressed excitement about the opportunity to bring minimally invasive care to more patients across Europe. ISRG stock has gained over 62% in the past year and is trading higher by 1.03% at $610.33. Investors can gain exposure to the stock via the Spinnaker ETF Series Langar Global HealthTech ETF LGHT.
